website_summaries.verdict: A quality table that undercuts competitors' prices.
pros: The poly-coated wooden surface is very even
Solidly built table that's great for families
Assembly is challenging for this 205-pound table, but expert assembly is an option for a fee
Comes with 8 pucks in 2 colors and a canister of wax
cons: Some customers reported difficulty achieving a level playing surface with leg levelers

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Momma said foosball is the devil but she doesn't have the password to my amazon account
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: rip off, i have to give a star to submit this review.  This should never be sold zero stars
customer_reviews.text: this is the worst product i've ever purchased in my life. It came with no assembly instructions! Called and emailed Amazon, no response. The table top is not solid wood but made of veneer. The puck either sticks to the surface or just slides of the table. Just had a big Thanksgiving get together and the table was the biggest joke. I bought this table for my birthday and thought it would just take time to get used to the table. Well that is not the case, this is the worst purchase possible. Do not buy this table you will waist your money.
customer_reviews.author: Mark P.

customer_reviews.title: Great table
customer_reviews.text: This table is heavy, so if you need it in a specific room, pay the extra $22 for room delivery. We were putting it upstairs and it was the best $22 I've spent. It took about 3 hours to fully assemble, but it wasn't difficult, just took some time. The table seems to be good quality, and runs very fast, which requires some skill to get the right distance on the puck. We played on this table at a rental house last year, and it proved to not disappoint here.
customer_reviews.author: sagmanaur

customer_reviews.title: Probably Amazons fault.
customer_reviews.text: The box was beat to crap and had a large cut in it even though it was marked "fragile". Came with three pieces broken or cracked. Including the large board that is attached to the main shuffleboard top, and one of the under table supports. Decided to put it together anyway cause its 200 pounds , 9 feet long and would have been a pain to return. So far it is holding together.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: ... a Retirement gift now i want one you will love the quality but the only thing is you need ...
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my Nephew for a Retirement gift now i want one you will love the quality but the only thing is you need to buy more of the dust stuff its just enough i felt it needed more on the board
customer_reviews.author: eva

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I have to say that after using this shuffleboard for a week it is well worth the money that was paid for it. I was quite skeptical to begin with as when it arrived the Box was torn on both ends and looked like it had been through a war. I realize this is the shipping company's fault and not the maker of the product, but still I was quite skeptical that all the parts were there and that it was not damaged. However all parts were there and the product is as advertised and a good addition to my game Room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great product, although it came with a lot of pieces to put together lol. I bought for my job for activities and many of our residents are enjoying this. When put together, it is very nice, very good material and very sturdy. This was a very nice addition to our business. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Main

customer_reviews.title: Great looking table but doesn't play well.
customer_reviews.text: First off the table once put together is solid and great. However the play on the table is just too much. You barely move the puck and it slides right off the other end of the table. It is okay i suppose if just using for kids but if adults want to use it I would recommend a different table. I mean I barely push the puck and it continues to slide right off the other end. I have it level and everything. Just too slick.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Bu

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in how quickly the top was damaged
customer_reviews.text: Was disappointed that within days the top was scuffed and scratched up despite using wax and the provided granules. By a week the colored stripes on one side were gauged and peeling off
customer_reviews.author: Kim D.

customer_reviews.title: Great lil' Table
customer_reviews.text: Great little table. Took about 2 hours to put together mostly by myself except for lifting the table top into position. Read directions and follow the notes and helpful hints and its a breeze. Definitely have a screw gun on hand with a philips bit. Also Buy a slower table wax the wax included is way to fast very hard to keep pucks on table. Try a #5 should work great. Have fun.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Would be a five if not slightly damamged
customer_reviews.text: The table was packaged great however there are scratches on a few of the sides. The table top is also slightly damaged on the end corners but doesnt affect play. For the price, it's a good table. We have had fun with it. Don't use the table wax they send. Use a wax #5. This is a 9ft table so you don't want your pucks flying off the table.
customer_reviews.author: Gemini7483

customer_reviews.title: Very good customer service
customer_reviews.text: We have enjoyed playing on our new table one of the pucks came damaged we contacted the company and they sent a new one right out. Very good customer service . I would recommend this item
customer_reviews.author: Kris Rietscha

customer_reviews.title: Regretful purchase
customer_reviews.text: Product came With obvious damage, several cracks in a few of the pieces, So a new one was sent with no problem. The new one was sent and appeared like it was fine but after we got it put together we noticed a decent sized scratch/dimple on the table that will definitely affect the play. Since the table is already put together we can’t return it.
customer_reviews.author: Zach Myers

customer_reviews.title: Great for a smaller table
customer_reviews.text: You definitely get what you pay for. I would have gave 5 stars, but a couple pieces were broken. Pretty nicely made. A great mini table. Save your pennies if you want a nice, big table. This one is great for the price and put together in under an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply constructed fragile and missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: Made of cheap thin plastic, missing hardware and several damaged pieces. Cheaply constructed. Called customer support and they were no help.
customer_reviews.author: SuperBuyer

customer_reviews.title: good communication! The best directions for assembling the product ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived ahead of schedule, good communication! The best directions for assembling the product I have ever seen, my husband and I put it together in less than two hours. Attractive and very sturdy, excellent product for the money! Lots of family fun ahead.
customer_reviews.author: dlr

customer_reviews.title: Great shuffleboard table!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy which I'm very happy with. My 3 kids have been playing as well as my wife and I. I wish care and use instructions came with it. I'll have to use google and youtube for that it looks like. Otherwise, exactly as advertised!
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Shuffleboard table
customer_reviews.text: Excellent game. just make sure you spray the table with shuffleboard silicone first. wipe lightly with dust free cloth. sprinkle on the dust. I ordered pro series new & improved shuffleboard silicone made by sun glow & speed 3 brown bear shuffleboard powder made by sun glow. They work well together.
customer_reviews.author: Jayneanne

customer_reviews.title: another addition to the rec room
customer_reviews.text: The table works well for our skill level considering we've never played it before.But when we upgrade we will definitely get a longer one ,this game takes a lot of patience and it's not designed for speed.My kids call this an old mans game .For the money it's worth it as an entry level unit ,we really enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: ROY ABRAMAT

customer_reviews.title: Awesome table!
customer_reviews.text: Table is perfect size for a home bar room. Assembly was fast, just make sure you have another person help. Very heavy and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Miszewski

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality for an affordable price!  Amazon assembly also made this a good experience.
customer_reviews.text: This was for my downstairs rec room. Nice quality for the price! Assembly was also easy (also purchased from Amazon) Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love my table !!!
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect in the bar. Everyone loves to play it rather than pool. Great value for the money and awesome delivery guys. I paid for the delivery to any room and they carried downstairs to the bar. Totally worth it !!!
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Shuffleboard
customer_reviews.text: Great board for man cave... only 9ft so I suggest the level 6 powder or it’s to fast ..easy to assemble
customer_reviews.author: Paul Tokarek

customer_reviews.title: pretty nice setup
customer_reviews.text: Having a lot of fun with this table. It took two big guys to get it up the stairs.
customer_reviews.author: Moiraine43

customer_reviews.title: Crap
customer_reviews.text: Garbage. Playing field warped to the center in both direction. Every throw, every time. All pucks roll backward to the middle. You think you have a 3 pointer and.....nope! Big fat zero again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a very well built table
customer_reviews.text: Not sure who's to blame, but we've had two delivered damaged. What I see is cheap wood that easily breaks
customer_reviews.author: Judith

customer_reviews.title: Very good bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Very good bang for the buck. Looks nice in the game room. Easy to put together. Pieces slide nicely. Has been good at getting the whole family to play together. Would have given 5 stars if the playing surface was hardwood vs engineered wood.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Cosgrove

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Took 1.5 hours to assemble board (without base) - 1 person assembling.
customer_reviews.author: AJones

customer_reviews.title: Great entertainment, lots of fun.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Great value for the money.People who are not into pool really enjoy this option.
customer_reviews.author: clifford ketcherside

customer_reviews.title: no rules for scoring
customer_reviews.text: arrived damaged, but they aloud discount. works best useing pucks plastic side down. they should give rules for scoring.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Pendleton

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: The box was broken when we got it, 4 of the pucks are missing, the corner piece is broken, the fake metal on the top of the table is chipped, the holes don’t match up when you put it together. I would not recommend this table!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a gift. It was missing parts. Recipient now has to go through the process of getting the parts. Have no idea how long that will take. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: Beware delievery
customer_reviews.text: Table came with a damagd side frame on arrival. The top is fine and works great but side wall came damaged. The box was delievered with one corner crumpled in.
customer_reviews.author: Kcs90

customer_reviews.title: need 2 people to assemble.other than that easy to put together...
customer_reviews.text: i love the table ..took an hr to do and instructions easy to read..
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this item!!! It has been a great addition to our rec room, very well built! Would definitely buy again 😊
customer_reviews.author: Cbmeyer99

customer_reviews.title: Nice table
customer_reviews.text: Came packed well and the instructions were well written....table plays great and looks very quality. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: R Berlin23

customer_reviews.title: Love the table
customer_reviews.text: Love the table. Very easy to assemble and the surface is great. Perfect table for basement as it not as large as regulation tables. Great purchase for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Lori P

customer_reviews.title: Materials and the finish looked like a cheap toy
customer_reviews.text: The price was right, it was cheap, however so was the product. Materials and the finish looked like a cheap toy. I will wait to see if this shuffleboard stands up to normal use and to kids. If not the 3 stars will have to go down!
customer_reviews.author: David Williams

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cant beat it for the money. All ages are enjoying this table.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Loved this table
customer_reviews.text: Loved this table, but get more powder right away it comes with very little. We have had so much fun with it, already!!
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: great price for what you
customer_reviews.text: This is the real deal, great price for what you get
customer_reviews.author: greg Shepard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this is a real sturdy value and you could spend hundreds more
customer_reviews.author: luke

customer_reviews.title: I would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: I would not buy again. Had to get a replacement because everything inside the box was broken and the process was a headache.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delivery
customer_reviews.text: The table looks great l. Put it together I love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Thunz pops

customer_reviews.title: Its better then I thought it would be easy to adjust ...
customer_reviews.text: Its better then I thought it would be easy to adjust the legs to level it and for the cost I don't think I could have got anything better
customer_reviews.author: James D Claeys

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: We love it! Every party tends to include a tournament these days.
customer_reviews.author: James R Garbacz

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply Made
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made. You're basically buying the playing surface. I used the playing surface and rebuilt it with real wood. Unless you plan on putting time into it with quality material I would stay away from this product. This board should cost no more than $200. I gave it 2 stars strictly because of the playing surface itself. Everything after that is junk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for the Money....
customer_reviews.text: The only downside was the assembly. It seems that if there was a way to totally break this thing down into as many parts as possible, this was it. However with a cordless drill it only took an hour and a half. The Table itself was great value for money and is sturdy and looks great. Perfect fit for our Garage Man Cave.
customer_reviews.author: D. Maines

customer_reviews.title: Met All Expectations
customer_reviews.text: As a novice shuffleboard table player, I found that this table met all my expectations. The table arrived in good shape due to good packaging. The pieces are clearly labelled for easy assembly. After assembly I was very pleased with the look and quality of the table.
customer_reviews.author: R. Warren

customer_reviews.title: The Price Was Right
customer_reviews.text: We first saw this shuffleboard on The Price is Right and couldn't believe how low the price was! We found it on Amazon for actually about $50 lower than we saw on TV. It is really heavy and built well. We love it and has added tons of fun to family get togethers.
customer_reviews.author: L. Ness

customer_reviews.title: Great Economy Model
customer_reviews.text: Unit went together fairly easy and didn't require a ton of skill. I'd suggest buying some silicone shuffleboard spray and a can of 5-7 shuffleboard powder. The stuff shipped with the unit is way too fast for any level of experience.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: So much Family Fun
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this Dec 2012 for a Christmas gift. This product is very nicely made. The instruction were easy to follow and it was easy to put together (total time 1.5 hrs) We have had so much fun playing this game. I also suggest purchasing Sun-Glo Silicone Shuffleboard Spray & #7 Speed Shuffleboard Powder Wax. If you are thinking of buying this I strongly suggest this product. Its made very sturdy & we plan to have many family game nights playing shuffleboard!! Deb V from NJ
customer_reviews.author: Deborah L Verner

customer_reviews.title: Family fun!
customer_reviews.text: We wanted a shuffleboard for the basement game room but a large board would not fit down the stairs so this 9 foot table was perfect! It looks nice and was easy to assemble. For the price it's a great deal and will probably get more use than the new pool table. It was packed well but I did have to call the manufacture to send me some new corners as they are plastic and were cracked and one was in a few pieces. They shipped me new corners with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Wilke

customer_reviews.title: Great table
customer_reviews.text: Was overall pretty easy to put together. Did it by myself in about an hour. Playing surface is nice and smooth as it should be.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: GREAT TABLE BUT !
customer_reviews.text: Great table for being 9 ft, easy to put together,BUT when playing the table wax that came with the table bunches up in front of the pucks.I bought new wax, haven't tried it yet will see if it's better....
customer_reviews.author: Chas Mac

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: If you're expecting a $5k table at this price, you're nuts. Sure, the surface is laminate, but it plays just fine for the casual player like myself. Some others talk about the silicone. While I agree the stuff that comes with it is a little too fast (you can get used to it and make really precise shots, but it would be terrible for kids), I've found the number 7 is too slow. It tends to clump more too. Just ordered some number 4 in hopes that it is the perfect medium.
customer_reviews.author: Peter C. Vanrysdam

customer_reviews.title: Why pay two dollars per play at a bar when you can have the same fun forever at your house go indoor shuffleboard
customer_reviews.text: Service was great. The men came in assembled it put it together and I was able to play it with no stress in my life very excited thank you
customer_reviews.author: Sheldon Klasfeld

customer_reviews.title: I am very satisfied. The only problem is that the board is ...
customer_reviews.text: It arrived early. I am very satisfied. The only problem is that the board is too this. If we are not careful to move the discs out of the way, a subsequent disc could be heading off the end of the table and lodge on top of the previously thrown disk, looking like a hanger.
customer_reviews.author: harry reynolds

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.text: Cheap filmsy table! Don't be fooled by the nice pictures! Everything is press board NOTHING is real wood. The board is a laminate on top of pressed particle board I am guessing. If you want to know the quality just go to Target or Walmart and look for the cheapest foosball The corners are made of thin plastic that will probably last. Just pay the extra money to get the a better board.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a table for adults, not rowdy kids, not drunks. It is more than expected for the money. Assembly requires two people, and a screw gun. If you don't have one, go get one. The table assembled weighs 200 pounds. So if you are thinking about paying for professional assembly, make sure that the service you pay for includes two people. When assembling the table (all done upside down) either do it on carpet or use the box it comes in to prevent damage to the edges. Vanessa and I did it in about 2 1/2 hours, including breaks and fooling around. BTW use a good straight comb to level the wax.
customer_reviews.author: David L. Laidig

customer_reviews.title: No
customer_reviews.text: It's cheaply made and the playing surface is not good. Lots of snow plowing
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Game Room Addition!
customer_reviews.text: Despite being a little difficult to put together, the finished product turned out super! It is more narrow than your typical shuffleboard but it makes for a great addition to any game room. Once put together it looks like an expensive table. The quality of the pucks is wonderful, they are heavy and made very well.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: a lot of fun - great table
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and perfect for an ametuer player. The wax that comes with it is very fast, but still fun and adds some challenge with the table being half regulation size. Fits perfectly in almost any space. Delivery was prompt for prime members and no damage upon travel as it was packaged very thoroughly.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Pucks track sometimes when sliding even after applying silicone spray and a better wax. Also the top surface is not real ...
customer_reviews.text: It's ok. Pucks track sometimes when sliding even after applying silicone spray and a better wax. Also the top surface is not real wood, its a laminate. Table is about $100.00 to much for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Skyles

customer_reviews.title: this is perfect. Good for kids and adults that aren't too ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is perfect. Good for kids and adults that aren't too serious.
customer_reviews.author: James Newman

customer_reviews.title: Bought this table because of price. We have had ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this table because of price. We have had it since Christmas and play on it a lot! I have done everything I was suppose to do to care for this table. Last three times we tried to play the pucks started sticking. I took all the salt or (wax) off and polished the board and reapplied the wax. The pucks were still sticking. I sprinkled the wax so thick they finally started sliding but leaving skid marks. Not sure what else to do. We stopped playing it. So disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better off paying $1000+ for a good table
customer_reviews.text: Get what you pay for. Few broken pieces in box. Missing hardware, broken hardware. Quality control needs to be looked at. Better off paying $1000+ for a good table.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Q.

customer_reviews.title: bad pucks, or need to try something else
customer_reviews.text: Our Atomic shuffleboard is tracking all the time. very frustrating. I tried different Sun Glo powder wax levels. Tried cleaning off with shuffleboard brush and then applying silicone spray ( all as directed) and reapplying powder. no luck. still tracks. Did I get a cheap shuffleboard , bad pucks, or need to try something else. Not happy! any help would appreciated. Would send back , but so heavy and had to put together that , that doesn't seem to be a great option.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Atomic 9’ Platinum Shuffleboard Table with Poly-coated Playing Surface for Smooth, Fast Puck Action and Pedestal Legs with Levelers for Optimum Stability and Level Play
product_meta.description: Shuffleboard isn't just for cruise ships! Enjoy smooth and fast puck action right in the comfort of your own home with the Atomic 9 ft. Platinum Shuffleboard Table. This solid play surface is ply-coated and stands on a laminated cabinet with pedestal legs with levelers for maximum stability. Keeping track of score is easy too thanks to an abacus-style scoring system off to the side. The whole family will love playing shuffleboard! The table measures 108.25" L x 24.25" W x 31" H and includes 8 pucks and a canister of shuffleboard wax.
feature_bullets: The Classic Game of Shuffleboard in a 9' Table Fits in Any Space
Poly-Coated Playing Surface Offers Smooth, Fast Puck Action
Pedestal Legs with Levelers Provide Optimum Stability and Level Play
Includes - 8 Pucks (4 Red and 4 Blue) and 1 Canister of Shuffleboard Wax
